deployment.title: Choose Your Deployment Method
deployment.subtitle: Select how you'd like to deploy your instance

serverless.title: Serverless Deployment
serverless.description: Deploy using serverless functions like AWS Lambda or Vercel Functions. Best for low-maintenance and auto-scaling needs.

docker.title: Docker Deployment
docker.description: Deploy using Docker containers. Ideal for self-hosted environments and maximum control.

script.title: Script Deployment
script.description: Deploy using custom scripts. Perfect for advanced users who need full customization.

mixin.title: Mixin Integration
mixin.subtitle: Would you like to enable Mixin for payments?

enable.title: Enable Mixin
enable.description: Accept payments through Mixin Messenger. Requires Mixin account setup.

disable.title: Skip Mixin
disable.description: Continue without Mixin integration. You can enable it later.

payment.title: Complete Payment
payment.subtitle: Scan the QR code with Mixin Messenger to complete payment

keys.title: Your Private Keys
keys.subtitle: Save these keys securely. You'll need them to access your instance.
keys.warning: Keep these keys safe! They cannot be recovered if lost.

addresses.title: Derived Addresses
addresses.subtitle: These addresses are derived from your private key

blockchain.title: Select Blockchains
blockchain.subtitle: Choose which blockchains you want to support

complete.title: Setup Complete!
complete.subtitle: Your instance is ready to deploy
